name: Caramelized Red Bell Peppers and Onions
author: CROW
summary: This divine combination of sweet red peppers and sweet red onions goes very well with lamb. To add a little variety, add 1/4 cup raisins before serving, it's delicious!
ingredients: 2  red bell pepper, cut into strips
directions: In a hot saucepan over a medium heat, combine red peppers, onion, oil and butter; saute for 2 minutes
Reduce heat to medium-low and continue cooking, stirring occasionally, until the onions and peppers soften
If desired, stir red wine into the vegetables and cook until the wine evaporates; approximately 30 minutes
Season with salt, pepper, and basil
